items.name: Double Strike
items.desc:
Sold as a pack of 12 x 330ml bottles. A tastebud-tickling Sour with a clean white grape aroma, hints of fresh white break and almost lemon curd-like sourness. A great gateway into the world of sour beers, and, with its mouthwatering properties â€” an excellent aperitif. Store and enjoy chilled.
INGREDIENTS
Water, barley, wheat, yeast, acidity regulators (malic acid, lactic acid, citric acid, tartaric acid), black tea, malt vinegar
HOPS
Magnum
Less than 10PPM
VEGAN

items.name: Fieldhopper
items.desc:
Sold as a pack of 12 x 330ml bottles. The earthy, honey flavours of this quintessentially English hop variety, balance a gentle bitterness with the delicate aroma of orange blossom and grapefruit. Perfect after a Sunday afternoon ramble in the countryside.
INGREDIENTS
Water, barley, wheat, hops, yeast, maltodextrin
East Kent Goldings
VEGAN

items.name: Off Piste
items.desc:
Sold as a pack of 12 x 330ml bottles. We think this beer does exactly what it says on the label, the luxurious chocolate notes from the porter and the deliciously moreish hazelnut flavour combine to make this ale almost a chocolate bar in a glass, a genuinely delightful indulgence at any time of year.
INGREDIENTS
Water, barley, wheat, lactose (milk), hops, yeast, hazelnut flavouring
Challenger
Less than 10PPM

items.name: Woodcutter
items.desc:
Sold as a pack of 12 x 330ml bottles. This beautiful ale is malt-focused with a toasty aroma and soft grassy notes because of the light use of hops. The palate is malty with a touch of fruit and caramel. Pair this beer with something hearty like a good beef stew.
INGREDIENTS
Water, barley, wheat, lactose (milk), hops, yeast
Magnum
Less than 10PPM
